name.baseName: Electricity production ; Electricity ; Thermal power (61.6%) + hydropower (34.1%) + wind power (3.5%) + solar power (0.9%)

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Forms of electricity generation include thermal power, hydropower, wind power and solar power
电力产生形式包括火力发电、水力发电、风力发电和太阳能发电

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Calculated based on data from the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook
根据2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算

technology.technologicalApplicability: The dataset describes an industrial process for electricity production, which includes the generation of power through several methods: thermal power, hydropower, wind power, and solar power. The breakdown of electricity production is 61.6% from thermal power, 34.1% from hydropower, 3.5% from wind power, and 0.9% from solar power. This mixture of electric power generation forms can be used to supply the electricity grid, meeting the energy demands for residential, commercial, and industrial purposes.
该数据集描述了一种电力生产的工业过程，其中包括通过多种方法生成电力：火力发电、水力发电、风力发电和太阳能发电。电力生产的构成是火力发电61.6%，水力发电34.1%，风力发电3.5%和太阳能发电0.9%。这种电力生成形式的混合可用于供应电网，满足住宅、商业和工业用途的能源需求。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the accounting method, please refer to the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities". Different forms of power generation and fuel consumption come from Chapter 3 (Energy Production) and Chapter 6 (Regional Energy Balance Sheet) in the "China Energy Statistical Yearbook 2020". The fuel parameters such as low calorific value and carbon content per unit calorific value used to calculate the carbon dioxide emission factor come from the "2019 China Regional Power Grid Carbon Dioxide Baseline Emission Factor Calculation Instructions OM" and the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emission Accounting Method and Reporting Guide for Power Generation Facilities" 》
核算方法参考《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》。不同形式发电量及燃料用量来自于《中国能源统计年鉴 2020》中的第三章（能源生产） 和第六章（地区能源平衡表）。用于计算二氧化碳排放因子的低位发热量、单位热值含碳量等燃料参数来自于《2019 年度中国区域电网二氧化碳基准线排放因子 OM 计算说明》、《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).
熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users who apply this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) should take into consideration the specific mix of electricity production when determining the environmental impact of products or systems requiring electricity. The carbon emission factors are calculated based on the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook data. When analyzing electricity-related emissions, it is crucial to adhere to the accounting method outlined in 'Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities.' The data set user should also be aware of the technological applicability and ensure that the data's regional relevance aligns with their assessment scope. Different forms of power generation and fuel usage, as well as fuel parameters for calculating CO2 emission factors, must be factored in accordingly.

应用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）的用户，在确定需要电力的产品或系统的环境影响时，应考虑电力生产的具体组合。碳排放因子基于2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算。在分析与电力相关的排放时，遵循《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》中概述的核算方法至关重要。数据集用户还应意识到技术的适用性，并确保数据的区域相关性符合其评估范围。必须相应考虑不同形式的发电和燃料使用，以及计算二氧化碳排放因子的燃料参数。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
